name: K33P1T4L1V3
description:
This game made for LD46 COMPO.

Our character contacts the other party by putting ciphered words on the documents. Boss is giving documents and character should put correct words in document.

Please play only with 16:9 ratio.

Musics made by Bosca Ceoil.
SFX made by Bfxr
Graphical assets made by Aseprite.
System made by Unity3D Engine.
